query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS email_logs; CREATE TABLE email_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  entityType ENUM('customer', 'vendor', 'lead', 'contact') NOT NULL,
  entityId INT NOT NULL,
  subject VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT,
  direction ENUM('sent', 'received') NOT NULL,
  visibility ENUM('private', 'public', 'shared') DEFAULT 'private' NOT NULL,
  sharedWithUserIds TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user tzGyVcj9oHnaUv9.3cfa47fa1e17 --database bQwuvX7ycRD88MLXJHLZXd --execute DROP TABLE IF EXISTS email_logs; CREATE TABLE email_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  entityType ENUM('customer', 'vendor', 'lead', 'contact') NOT NULL,
  entityId INT NOT NULL,
  subject VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  body TEXT,
  direction ENUM('sent', 'received') NOT NULL,
  visibility ENUM('private', 'public', 'shared') DEFAULT 'private' NOT NULL,
  sharedWithUserIds TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
